label: 藤原宗忠
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (1062-1141). Comp. Sakumon daitai 作文大体 (Basics of Compostion," ca. 1108; a kanbun treatise), and Inkashū 韻花集, Hakuritsuin 白律韻 (Iushi from several collections arranged according to rhyme, both lost). Credited by some to have compiled the Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集. Diary Chūyū ki 中右記 (1087-1138). Kanshi in Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集 (3), and Wakan kensakushū (1). [漢文、律詩、漢詩、和漢兼作集] "
